runAsContext.description: Tdarr requires to run as root to start the Tdarr server (and optionally node).

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Tdarr requires this ability to chown files.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Tdarr requires this ability to bypass file ownership checks for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Tdarr requires this ability to switch group for sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Tdarr requires this ability to switch user for sub-processes.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Tdarr.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Tdarr.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6
